name: Oops! My dear is a deer (United Dreams)
name_original: Oops! My dear is a deer (United Dreams)
description:
Girlfriend left — after you've turned her into a deer. Get her back! (As human)

She must be somewhere in this Night Club.
Or rather, SOMEONE in this Night Club

Just transform some people with your MorphGun™ and you'll find her. Eventually.

Controls:
WASD keys to move
Mouse to look around and shoot

Music by Bensound: http://www.bensound.com/
